oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Virulence and genotype of a bovine herpesvirus 1 isolate from semen of a subclinically infected bull
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Van Oirschot, J. T.
Rijsewijk, F. A. M.
Straver, P. J.
Ruuls, R. C.
Quak, J.
Davidse, A.
Westenbrink, F.
Gielkens, A. L. J.
van Dijk, J. E.
Moerman, A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A bovine herpesvirus 1 (BHV-1) isolate from the semen of a subclinically infected bull was administered to cattle by various routes to assess its virulence. Full article published in Veterinary Record (1995) 137, 235-239
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1995; 66
